body_html: You can use gcc_linux-64 and/or gxx_linux-64 instead. We are promoting those as something users will want to use. AD 5 has been rebuilt from scratch using them. Using the old gcc package will clobber the needed libstdc++.so with an older one.
body_text: You can use gcc_linux-64 and/or gxx_linux-64 instead. We are promoting those as something users will want to use. AD 5 has been rebuilt from scratch using them. Using the old gcc package will clobber the needed libstdc++.so with an older one.
body: You can use `gcc_linux-64` and/or `gxx_linux-64` instead. We are promoting those as something users will want to use. AD 5 has been rebuilt from scratch using them. Using the old `gcc` package will clobber the needed `libstdc++.so` with an older one.
